Top Ability Rules: increase/decrease size of plant by X
Bottom Ability Rules: Create 1 foot thick wall, X+Y tall and wide, X feet away
General Notes: Attack die are responded to with Defence Die

Top Ability Rules: Target is revived from downed state, their health is = X
Bottom Ability Rules: X are targeted, healed by Y amount
General Notes: Influence die are responded to with Influence Die

Top Ability Rules: return card from discard after attack
Bottom Ability Rules: Return 3 cards from discard
General Notes: All targets must be within range or whatever your weapon is (within Close range if no weapon is present)

Top Ability Rules: know an enemies weaknesses or resistances
Bottom Ability Rules: add X to attack value

Top Ability Rules: Topple if damage is dealt
Bottom Ability Rules: Respond to every attack with an attack

Top Ability Rules: On success, targets next roll of any kind is reduced by X
Bottom Ability Duration: Until targets next attack/defense roll, or until start of next turn
Bottom Ability Rules: target adds X to next attack or defense value

Top Ability Rules: for every attack that deals damage, you may lose X health and attack again
Bottom Ability Rules: add X to attack value

Top Ability Rules: if marked, add influence to attack value, then unmark target
Bottom Ability Rules: Mark target if damage is dealt

Top Ability Rules: Transform into similar-sized creature. Add X to defence values, attack values, or health. After duration, lose Y in Health Points
Bottom Ability Rules: Summon 1) a plant [all die = your influence die, range 5 feet, health = X, no movement] or 2) a creature [attack die = your attack die, defense = Y, range 5 feet, health = Y, movement = your movement]

Top Ability Rules: Lose X health points, attack target X times
Bottom Ability Rules: Lose X health points. Increase all defense values by X

Top Ability Rules: Heal target by X
Bottom Ability Rules: target returns 1 card from discard

Top Ability Rules: Attack, increasing range by 5 feet and movement by 15 feet
Bottom Ability Rules: attack target twice, lose 15 feet of movement

Top Ability Duration: Next Defense Roll, or until start of next turn
Top Ability Rules: Add X to next defense value
Bottom Ability Duration: Next Defense Roll, or until start of next turn
Bottom Ability Rules: If next defense value is greater than opposing attack value, attacker takes difference in damage

Top Ability Rules: Choose 2 of the following: 1) add 25 movement, 2) return card from discard, 3) add X to next influence roll
Bottom Ability Rules: Choose 1 of the following: 1) add X to next Attack, 2) add X to next defense, 3) attack target

Top Ability Rules: at a range of X*Y  feet, create a 25 ft diameter smoke screen. Applies No Sight to any creature within
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, target cannot target you with an action on their turn

Top Ability Rules: on success, target is forced to perform 1 specified non-self-harming act on their next turn
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, discard a card and gain knowledge of next actions

Top Ability Rules: Add X to attack value
Bottom Ability Rules: If Y is less than X, you may return a used token to unused

Top Ability Rules: if marked, target movement is reduced to 0, then unmark target
Bottom Ability Rules: Attack X targets, damaged targes are marked

Top Ability Rules: Use type token. Attack target X times, using Influence die instead of attack die
Bottom Ability Rules: Type token must be used. add X to attack value

Top Ability Rules: target adds your Influence Die to all their Attack/Defense values
Bottom Ability Rules: Choose a type. On success, then target is weak to that type

Top Ability Scaler: Amount Attack Value is reduced by (X), Level (Y)
Top Ability Rules: reduce this attack value by X, X cannot exceed Y, you may add X to your next attack value
Bottom Ability Scaler: Amount Attack Value is reduced by (X)
Bottom Ability Rules: reduce this attack value by X. If damage is still dealt, deal X twice in damage

Top Ability Rules: Return X cards from discard and perform X of these abilities: 1: Learn Target Enemies abilities 2: Learn Target Enemies Attack/Defense/Influence Die 3: Learn Target Enemies gear and health
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, exhaust a card, and target can only play one action on their next turn

Top Ability Duration: until end of targets next turn
Top Ability Rules: On success, discard a card, and target cannot attack you
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, discard a card, and target must attack you with at least one action. Must be within their range.

Top Ability Duration: Until end of day, or creature's death
Top Ability Rules: Summon X beings with 1 health. Their defense die is a 1d4. Their Attack Value is Y. Their movement is equal to yours
Bottom Ability Duration: Until end of day, or creature's death
Bottom Ability Rules: Summon a being with X health. Its Attack/Defense Value is 1d4 + Y. Its movement is equal to yours

Top Ability Rules: Lose X health points, return X cards from discard
Bottom Ability Rules: discard a card, exchange a card from discard with a card from your deck, which goes into discard

Top Ability Rules: if damage is dealt, target's next defense roll is reduced by X
Bottom Ability Name: You want a side with that?
Bottom Ability Rules: if X%2, heal X. If X%3, recover discarded card. else, next attack value increases by 1

Top Ability Scaler: Up to the amount of cards in hand (X)

Bottom Ability Scaler: Up to the amount of cards in hand (X)
Bottom Ability Rules: Discard X card, return X cards from discard

Top Ability Rules: Discard a card
Bottom Ability Rules: N/A

Top Ability Rules: If target is marked, add X to attack value. Heal for however much damage was dealt, if any, then remove mark
Bottom Ability Rules: if target is marked, topple target, then remove mark

Top Ability Scaler: Up to the amount of cards in hand (X)
Top Ability Rules: Discard X cards, add X to attack value. On damage being dealt, enemy is moved X*5 feet away from you
Bottom Ability Scaler: up to the amount of cards in hand (Y)
Bottom Ability Rules: Type token must be used. Discard Y cards. all targets in 5*Y ft area roll Defense against X.

Top Ability Rules: Target up to X enemies. Attack each Target Enemy X times. Add X damage to each attack value
Bottom Ability Rules: Add 25 movement to your turn and return a target card from discard to your hand

Top Ability Rules: Until your next turn, if an attack is made against you roll a die. If the value is even then dodge the attack and take no damage. If the value is odd then add X to your Defense Value.
Bottom Ability Rules: If the targetted enemy attacks you before your next turrn then add X to your Defense Value

Top Ability Rules: If your attack kills the targetted enemy, gain another attack. Repeat this until you attack an enemy and they survive.
Bottom Ability Rules: If your attack deals damage to target enemy then add X to your next attack if it is agaisnt that enemy

Top Ability Rules: If your attack deals damage to Target Enemy, then that Target Enemys next Influence Roll will use a reduced die down to a minimum of a 1d4
Bottom Ability Duration: Until Target Enemys next Attack/Defense roll
Bottom Ability Rules: If your Influence Value is greater than Target Enemys Influence Value then their next Attack or Defense roll will use reduced die/dice with a minimum od a d4.
